did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.unittitle: Williamsburg (Va.) District Court Clerk's Fee Bill, 1790

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Williamsburg (Va.) District Court Clerk's Fee Bill, 1790. Local government records collection, Williamsburg Court Records. The Library of Virginia, Richmond, Va. 23219.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: This item came to the Library of Virginia under the accession number 39022.

bioghist.head: Historical Information
bioghist.p: Williamsburg was established in 1699. It was incorporated as a borough in 1722 and incorporated as a city in 1884.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: Williamsburg (Va.) District Court Clerk's Fee Bill, 1790. Consists of a clerk's fee bill from William Russell, Clerk of Williamsburg District Court, for entering a judgment, a copy, an order, and a record.

relatedmaterial.head: Related Material
relatedmaterial.p: The city of Williamsbg is one of Virginia's Lost Records Localities. Additional city of Williamsburg Court Records may be found in the Virginia Lost Records Localities Collection at the Library of Virginia. Search the Lost Records Localities Database found at the Library of Virginia web site.
